@Nagakura: I know, right? The difference between the actual source material's writing and the general writing quality in the anime made DxD one of the rare instances of the anime being infinitely better than the original version. For the first three seasons, anyway... I refuse to watch the fourth season because I just can't accept that fucking artstyle, so I can't really comment on the writing from that point on. Since the art change is a result of a studio change, I'd imagine the writing likely took a drastic shift as well. Especially considering the apparent reason for the studio change...
